name: Reel Talk
description:
Ahoy, maties!

Reel Talk is a game about Santiago, a pirate retired from his swashbuckling days and spending his golden years fishing at the Fish Town Bay. He is out of luck, but he is aiming to buy the golden hook and finally catch the Golden Marlin (fish). 

However, what he does not know is that the villagers are not very friendly, and are trash-talking him behind his back. Will you befriend them and earn their trust? Or will you go a more sinister route?

Play using your mouse to click on the screen, and dragging downwards when out at sea, to hear what the villagers say when Santiago is not around.

Made in 48 hours at Nordic Game Jam 2021

Horatiu Roman - programming, game design

Lars Bindslev - graphics, game design

Julian Hansen - programming, fishing
